personal.name: Arijit Sarkar
personal.title: Network & On-Prem Infrastructure Engineer
personal.description: Passionate about building robust network architectures and scalable infrastructure solutions. Specializing in cloud technologies, network security, and system optimization.

paragraphs: I am a highly accomplished IT infrastructure and virtualization specialist with over 7 years of experience in designing, optimizing, and securing enterprise-scale systems. Currently serving as a Senior IT and Network Admin at Kloudspot India, I lead critical initiatives across Linux server administration, multi-region networking, and compliance. My expertise spans achieving 99.9% uptime for 50+ Linux servers, architecting secure global networks via WireGuard VPN (reducing latency by 40%), and automating SSL renewals for 150+ devices to eliminate certificate outages.

Previously at Zen & Art Infotek, I managed large-scale VMware environments, including 100+ ESXi hosts supporting 500+ VMs with 99.95% uptime. I optimized vSAN storage (cutting costs by 25%), streamlined HA/DRS operations, and resolved 95% of critical failures within SLA. My foundational role at OnProcess Technology honed my skills in enterprise ticketing, VMware/AD support, and Windows deployment, where I resolved 300+ monthly tickets while maintaining 95% SLA compliance.

experience.title: Senior IT and Network Admin
experience.description: Leading network infrastructure projects and client deployment. Managing a team of 4 engineers and overseeing critical infrastructure deployments.
achievements: Linux Server Administration: Managed 50+ Linux servers (Ubuntu/ArchLinux), achieving 99.7% uptime through proactive monitoring, rapid troubleshooting, and patch management.

Cross-Region Network Infrastructure: Engineered a secure multi-region WireGuard VPN connecting 5 office locations, integrating failover links and Nginx reverse proxies—reducing latency by 40% and ensuring 24/7 accessibility for 200+ users.

Network Optimization: Resolved 95% of critical network issues within SLA (≤1 hour), including routing, switching, and firewall configurations across Cisco and Mikrotik devices, slashing downtime by 30%.
Automated Certificate Management: Automated SSL renewals for 150+ devices using Bash/Let’s Encrypt, eliminating manual effort and preventing 100% of certificate-related outages.

High-Availability Infrastructure: Maintained Proxmox/VMware + TrueNAS clusters across 3 regions with cross-region replication, supporting 200+ VMs and cutting recovery time by 70% during regional outages.
Unified Monitoring: Centralized oversight of 500+ endpoints via Tactical RMM, enabling real-time alerts and reducing manual audit time by 50%.
ISO 9001 Compliance: Led documentation and process alignment for ISO 9001 certification, achieving 100% compliance in the first audit cycle with zero non-conformities.

experience.title: Service Delivery Engineer
experience.description: Specialized vmware infrastructure. Responsible for managing and maintaing a Comercial Bank VMWare enviroment with a 500+ servers.
achievements: VMware vCenter/ESXi VxRail Management: Managed 100+ ESXi hosts across 3 VxRail clusters supporting 500+ VMs, achieving 99.95% uptime through proactive monitoring, snapshot consolidation, and RDM/datastore optimization.
High-Availability Operations: Ensured continuous operations via HA/DRS configurations and 200+ monthly vMotion migrations, resolving 95% of job failures within 30 minutes to maintain SLA compliance.

vSAN Performance Optimization: Implemented space efficiency (dedupe/compression), reservation policies, and fault domains - reducing storage costs by 25% while improving disk balance by 40% across clusters.

Backup Infrastructure Support: Provided secondary administration for enterprise backup systems (Veeam/Commvault), resolving 90% of backup failures for 50TB+ daily backups, ensuring <1hr RPO for critical systems.
Process-Driven Incident Resolution: Resolved 120+ monthly tickets following strict SOPs, maintaining 100% audit readiness for virtualization infrastructure.

experience.title: Systems Engineer
experience.description: Started career focusing on desktop support, troubleshooting, and security implementations. Gained hands-on experience with enterprise system and networking equipment.
achievements: Enterprise Ticketing & SLA Compliance: Resolved 300+ monthly technical tickets via JIRA for 500+ end-users, achieving 95% SLA compliance (≤4hr resolution for critical issues) across Windows, VMware, and VPN systems.

Frontline Infrastructure Support: Owned Tier-1 troubleshooting for VMware (vCenter/ESXi), Active Directory, and VPN systems – resolving 90% of password/access issues in <15 minutes and reducing AD-related tickets by 40% through proactive account hygiene.
Windows Deployment & Management: Streamlined OS deployment for 100+ Windows systems annually using standardized imaging tools, cutting setup time by 50% and ensuring 100% security patch compliance.
